short_description: The TF Enrichment building block uses [DecoupleR](https://saezlab.github.io/decoupleR/) and [Dorothea](https://saezlab.github.io/dorothea/) to estimate transcription factor activities from perturbational data.
long_description: The TF Enrichment building block uses [DecoupleR](https://saezlab.github.io/decoupleR/) and [Dorothea](https://saezlab.github.io/dorothea/) to estimate transcription factor activities from perturbational data.

default.name: input_file
default.description: Input gene expression data. Genes should be normalized across samples

default.name: tsv
default.description: Import data as TSV instead of CSV (TRUE | FALSE)

default.name: weight_col
default.description: Name of the column containing differential expression values (e.g t-statistic from DESeq2) between a control/treatment condition for example, or just log-fold change.

default.name: id_col
default.description: Name of the column for gene ids

default.name: confidence
default.description: Level of confidence to be used for regulons. E.g.: A,B,C. (see https://saezlab.github.io/dorothea/ for documentation)

default.name: pval_threshold
default.description: Filter out TFs with adj. p-val above the provided value

default.name: export_carnival
default.description: Export a table with the results with two columns (id, value) only (for CARNIVAL)(TRUE/FALSE)

default.name: output_file
default.description: Result csv file with estimated TF activities
